scripture.title: The Parable of the Mustard Seed
scripture.message: 30 Again he said, “What shall we say the kingdom of God is like, or what parable shall we use to describe it? 31 It is like a mustard seed, which is the smallest of all seeds on earth. 32 Yet when planted, it grows and becomes the largest of all garden plants, with such big branches that the birds can perch in its shade.”

objective.label: What Is Divine Appointment?
message: It is an encounter with God, meeting Him personally, face to face. It is a time when God, through the shed blood of His Son Jesus and by the power of the Holy Spirit deals with our past and present so that we can have a meaningful life today.
Cesar Castellanos said “I have seen lives completely transformed during these three days with radical changes that are usually not seen even after a full year.”

note.label: Note
message: Share your experiences in the Divine Appointment and how powerful it is. Make him/her be inspired and desire the Divine Appointment. And challenged him/her to join the Divine Appointment.
